title: calling Close() on socket doesn't interrupt an Accept() call  (Darwin only)
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

The attached program blocks indefinitely on Mac OS X.

What is the expected output?

It should terminate as soon as the listening socket is closed.

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?

Darwin, 386. This doesn't happen on Linux.
Attachments: 1. acceptbug.go (902 bytes)
